name: Data Synthesizer
description: Use LLMs to create synthetic data for your usecases

generation_type.title: Generation Type
enum: scratch (generate from scratch based on scenario)

docs.title: Reference Documents (for 'docs' generation only). Provide comma separated list of document paths

embedding_model.title: Embedding Model (for 'docs' generation only. Provide the name of the embedding model from Huggingface or its local path)

context.title: Context (for 'context' generation only). Paste all your reference context here

scenario.title: Scenario (for 'scratch' generation only). Describe the scenario for which you want to generate data

task.title: Task (for 'scratch' generation only). Describe the task for which you want to generate data

input_format.title: Input Format (for 'scratch' generation only). Describe the format of the input data which will be sent to the model

expected_output_format.title: Expected Output Format (for 'scratch' generation only). Describe the format of the output data which will be received from the model

generation_type.ui:help: Select the type of generation you want to perform

docs.ui:help: Provide the paths of the reference documents separated by comma

embedding_model.ui:help: Provide the name of the embedding model from Huggingface or its local path

context.ui:help: Paste all your reference context here

scenario.ui:help: Describe the scenario for which you want to generate data

task.ui:help: Describe the task for which you want to generate data

input_format.ui:help: Describe the format of the input data which will be sent to the model

expected_output_format.ui:help: Describe the format of the output data which will be received from the model
